description: Both stylish and comfortable, our Men’s Active Tech Pant is designed in a regular fit, so you have room to move, and offers panels of Merino Sport fabric for breathability. With outdoor-minded features like reflective elements for low-light conditions and a quick-dry finish, this pant is as suited for a beautiful fall hike as it is for grabbing a coffee on the terrace after.
name: Smartwool Active Tech Pants - Mens
